mapper.insert: insert into shopping(goods_id, goods_title, goods_qty, cate_fir, cate_sec, priceOrigin, priceSale, priceRetail, detail) values (#{goods_id}, #{goods_title}, #{goods_qty}, #{cate_fir}, #{cate_sec}, #{priceOrigin}, #{priceSale}, #{priceRetail}, #{detail})
insert into shopping_detail_image(goods_id, fileName, fileType) values (#{goods_id}, #{fileName}, #{fileType})
